courses.title: Organic Chemistry Mastery
courses.description: Master organic chemistry with detailed explanations of reaction mechanisms, functional groups, and synthesis pathways. Perfect for A-Level, IGCSE, and FSc students.

courses.title: Physical Chemistry Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand thermodynamics, kinetics, and equilibrium with practical applications. Comprehensive coverage for exam success.

courses.title: Inorganic Chemistry Complete
courses.description: Comprehensive inorganic chemistry covering periodic trends, bonding, and transition metals. Essential for board exams.

courses.title: Chemistry for IGCSE & O-Level
courses.description: Foundation course covering all IGCSE and O-Level chemistry topics with exam-focused practice and clear explanations.

courses.title: A-Level Chemistry Intensive
courses.description: Advanced A-Level chemistry preparation with detailed theory, practical work, and past paper practice for top grades.

courses.title: Chemistry Lab Techniques
courses.description: Learn essential laboratory skills, safety procedures, and practical chemistry techniques for exams and real-world applications.
